analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ ca te sabbadisā pabhāsati iti
vaṇṇaḥ ca me sabbadisā pabhāsati iti

original: Mama ca, bhante, vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandeyyāsi—
analyzed: mama ca bhante vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandeyyā asi

original: ‘lakhumā nāma, bhante, upāsikā bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī’ti.
analyzed: lakhumā nāma bhante upāsikā bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati iti

original: Anacchariyaṁ kho panetaṁ, bhante, yaṁ maṁ bhagavā aññatarasmiṁ sāmaññaphale byākareyya.
analyzed: anacchariyam kho pana ita bhante yam mama bhagavā aññatarasmim sāmañña phale byākareyya
tam bhagavā sakadāgāmi phale byākāsi iti
